ⲱ 𐤔 ש ˢwen ˢwˡ שwov ᶴomicron ο schwaches ᶴo ס𐤏 vs ω Ω Omega 𔖚 𔖛 𔖙 𓈙𓊪 𔗔 sa₁

u < v < ω < w ⲱ < ph պ ⰱ 𓊪 p ( hieratic )

♀ Venus ≈ 𓃀 𓈖 𓅣 ᵇVenus ≈ 𜎯𜐪𜏌𜏵 Phoenikeʳ phoenix 𓋹 𓈖 𓐍 ⲱⲛϧ Phoenike 𖧂 POON @Bamum

sphine

φαίνω phaín < 𓋴 𓃀 𓇼 𓏤 > shine

The old 'š' reading is obvious in many places other that ⲱ ≈ 𐤔 ≈ ש ≈ Ϣ ϣ ≈ Ш ≈ 山:

ⲱⲁⲃⲓⲗⲟⲥ 🇬🇷 n. the arabic month 'shawal` < •shabilos

𓋴 𓂝 𓅓 𓄈 | swallow | ˢⲱⲙⲕ ˢōmk =>
𓂝 𓅓 𓀁 | swallow | ⲱⲙⲕ ōmk almak@Turk < ˢwˡmak

The reasons ⲱ is misread as o without s component are
1. semitic 𐤏 is misread as o instead of ס=s
2. ω omicron may have been sub-micron with near inaudible (micro) s&b

ϭⲱϫ , ϭⲏϫ stained ⋍> ⲏ HN/HM
